titles.title: Expressing support for increasing awareness of craniofacial anomalies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/28/2010--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) increasing public awareness and acceptance of those living with craniofacial anomalies; and (2) promoting continued development of groundbreaking research and medical procedures for individuals living with such anomalies.
